articles.author: Julia Horowitz, CNN Business
articles.title: NYSE bans Chinese telecom stocks in second about-face of the week - CNN
articles.description: The New York Stock Exchange will delist three Chinese telecommunications stocks to comply with an executive order from the Trump administration — its second about-face on the issue this week.
